string-array.name: letters_woman_to_man
string-array.item:
Babe, 

 Just wanted to say thank you for who you are. I'\m grateful for what you bring into my life, I'\m grateful for our relationship, and grateful for myself for choosing you. 

 Your loving lady

Sweetie, 

 Even if I don'	 tell you this every single day, I want you to know that you are a big, shining light in my life. 

 Me

Honey, 

 I'\m happy to have you with me because we have a special bond.I know this because I can feel it. The world is full of opportunities and distractions, and within all this choosing you was one of the wisest things I'\ve done. 

 BIG LOVE üíú

Prince, 

 We have been through so many things, joy and difficulties and pleasure and pain.When I look backward and see how much you'\ve taught me about myself, all I have left is to thank you. 

 Waiting for you

Sugar, 

 When was the last time I told you that you'e beautiful? You know what, it doesn'	 matter, it'\s always a good time to tell you this again :) 

 Your woman

Baby, 

 Our love is a beautiful thing, deep and beautiful.It'\s a cozy home to return to after a long day and a source of power to move on. Always remember that you are the good guiding power of my life. 

 Love you üíú

Sunshine, 

 I want you to know that there is always something so calming in your presence, it'\s spreads throughout your environment. When you read this sentence and smile to yourself, know that another little light is entering this world. 

 Waiting for you, always üå∏

Hon, 

 You bring happiness into my life and stability and a sense of home, a warm place to return to. And it'\s just good to know that you'e by my side. 

 Love and appreciate ‚ù§

Darlin'\, 

 Regardless of how many times I told you I love you, it'\s always a good time to repeat the message :) 

 Your woman

Dream boat, 

 After all, it'\s a simple thing - I chose you because I feel good with you. You'e a source of order and power in my life and I simply love it when we are together. 

 With love ‚ù§

My soulmate, 

 Every relationship has its complexity, its challenges, and its beauty. I want you to know that I'\m with you in this completely. I chose you to walk a long road, and I know that in the end we'\ll both be better people simply by walking it together. 

 Happy that we chose each other

Baby, 

 I was very happy to wake up in the morning with you and I can'	 wait to snuggle with you again tonight. 

 Waiting for you‚Ä¶

Angel, 

 I love the gaze in your eyes, your hair, your smile.. you'e a gift I got right into my life and that'\s where I would like you to stay. 

 Served with a big smile üôÇ

To the pretty man walking down my street, 

 You'e a source of goodness and pleasure in my life and I'\ve learned a lot from you. Even if sometimes my energy changes and weakens, remember that our relationship is a blessing to both of us. 

 Your lady

All the single gentlemen.. n\ All the single gentlemen.. n\ All the single gentlemen.. n\ Now put your hands up.. n\ 


That'\s Beyonc√©'\s new hit baby, I can'	 take part in it because we have a good relationship and when it'\s good you don'	 have to jump around 
 

Maybe we should go on a date and see her concert? Later on we can get to a store and get me these shoes I wanted for a long time :) or some other little gift.. doesn'	 matter, as long as we hang out together. 

 Always with you ‚ù§

To be penetrated by you is a moment of exaltation, as the world becomes transparent and there'\s only us, connected in the union of hearts. I will always cherish these moments when you remind me without words the thing that I desire the most, more than any goal I set, big or small. I will always want to come back to you at the end of the day and this is what my effort is all about. 

 

 For many more years of passion ‚ù§

Commitment.
 

Commitment is the frame for our relationship, its source of stability and anchor for the passion and intimacy we'\ve built. I'\m committed to you out of choice and know that it is one of the greatest gifts we give to one another. I want you to remember that you'e a source of confidence in my life, a physical and emotional home to return to. 
 
 For many more years of commitment,
 Your princess

Intimacy. /n/n Intimacy is the ability to honestly share my inner world and listen fully to what you share yourself.\n It is a major piece of what we\'\ve built, it\'\s an emotional commitment. \n When we dwell in intimacy I accept you the way you are, and you do the same for me. When our emotional needs get fulfilled our love strengthens. /n/n For many more years of intimacy,/n Your nugget

Baby, 

 There are many reasons why I love being with you. When you do something for me with a generous smile I can feel that you care about me and that I'\m important for you. I want you to know how much you'e important to me as well. 

 Happy that we are together :)

Nugget, 

 It feels good to wake up with you in the morning. Even when your eyes are barely open and your voice is still sleepy, you'e still my knight in shiny armor. 

 Lost of hearts ‚ù§‚ù§

To my caveman :), 

 Just wanted you to know that I'\m very thankful for our relationship. You'e a special man with depth and wisdom and it'\s a great privilege to be with you. 

 Your princess ‚ú®

To my amazing guy, 

 I'\m like the ocean and my feelings are like the waves. Sometimes calm, sometimes raging, sometimes sweeping, but always in motion, an unquestionable power. And you? you'e the ship that sails upon my water, a ship that I'\m always happy to move forward. 

 Yours truly üåä

Hon, 

 Your presence and manhood is the directing power of our relationship. You provide that feeling that under all the emotional movements there is a solid ground. When you realize that and it becomes transparent within your life, everything around you starts smiling back.


 Love, 
 Your peach

Baby Angel, 

 Our relationship is the best event in town with a huge number of attractions. There'\s are award-winning games, kids'\ activities, and a band that plays according to the mood of the crowd. But most important, it has me and you so even if there aren'	 activities and a band and nobody is looking we still enjoy being together and that'\s where the magic starts. 

 Until next melody üéµ

My precious, 

 The president just called and invited us to the next cabinet meeting to present our relationship as a representative sample of good people that love being with each other. I told him we'\ve already scheduled a date but can make an appointment next week. Nobody will take the fun from us üòò 

 With love,
 Your very connected woman ;)

Cupcake, 

 I love it when you smile at me, it gives back the color to my face and I don'	 need anything else. 

 Kisses üòò

Mister Lover, 

 I wrote a song for you and put it in the drawer. When I entered the room again it magically disappeared. And then I thought to myself that it'\s not that bad, because I can simply tell you here how wonderful you are. 

 Love you,
 Me

Muffin, 

 According to the legend. Aladdin took Jasmine on a date on a flying carpet. In our case, the carpet mainly needs to be cleaned from dust, but the magic will never, ever disappear üòç 

 With love,
 Your private princess ;)

Romeo, 

 If there were no cars in the world you would have come to pick me up in a carriage. And if all carriages were taken you would have given me a piggyback. And if I'\ll be too old for this as well, Then we can always walk hand in hand along the road around our neighborhood. 

 Waiting for you to pick me up ;)

To the most beloved man, 

 According to the Jewish tradition, 40 days before a person is born a transcendent echo is heard in the upper worlds declaring his partner for his current lifetime. I personally never heard that voice, was too busy in the womb'\s little politics. However, I'\m really happy about the arrangement the good Lord has made for me. 

 Me ‚ú®

Cutie Pie, 

 Like they say in Gibberish: kljdsf fdalfkjhaed ldfmgds kljfdgsad mkdfgasdfk adfkja‚Ä¶ loosely translated this means that you'e always inside me and will never leave. 

 Forever yours ;)

Sweetheart, 

 At the end of the road, when we'\ll be old, we'\ll sit together at a round solid wood table and drink raspberry-based wine. Maybe we'\ll also play bridge, who knows? The most important thing is that we'\ll do this together. 

 With love, 
 Your future old lady ‚ù§

Sunshine, 

 In one of his songs, Justin Bieber wrote that being with you is like getting a degree in the Art of Love. OK he didn'	 really write this, but I can imagine him doing so :)
 That way or another, I feel that life beside you is my big university to the professions of love, and that in the end I won'	 get a degree, but the smile you have on your face after living a life worth the effort. 

 Your educated woman üéì

To my gorgeous man, 

 I love you like the gardener loves his flower, like the jeweler loves his jewelry, like the poet loves his songs, like accountant loves his yearly reports, like the painter loves his brushes, like a child loves his smartphone.. Well you get the point, and it also loves the sentence it'\s written in. That way or another, you'e very important to me and our relationship is here to stay, like a beautiful sculpture that has been with us for many years (and the sculptor really loves üòâ) 

 Yours truly, 
 Your smartass ;)

Love Bug, 

 Our love is like the ocean, filled with many great things. It has waves, sometimes calm and other times stormy, and also foam and sand and a popsicles seller walking around making children happy. And everything is important and has its place. Our relationship is deep, meaningful, and colorful and I'\m happy that we share it together. 

 Love you a million! üåä

The beaver - builds dams 
 The turtle - has an entire house on its back 
 The pigeon - sent our mail for thousands of years 
 And in this relationship I sometimes feel what it'\s like to be them. Sometimes I build, sometimes I take my time, and sometimes I send you letters. That way or another, everything I do within it I try to do with great love and commitment. 

 You'e very important to me and I'\m proud of what we'\ve built throughout the time ‚ù§

Buttercup, 

 When you'e 100% present with me I can feel how I become more beautiful and calm, and when you smile I also do. My light and the motion of my moods radiates on yours, and my emotional world is connected with yours in a way that belongs to lovers. That is why it'\s so important to me that you'\ll be happy and fulfilled, because what'\s yours is mine and vice versa, and that'\s why I'\m always here for you. 

 Me ‚ù§

The door was locked by a mysterious spell and the princess had no choice but to dangle her long, beautiful hair through the window and all the way down. 
 And then, in a flash of wisdom that seemed to be rising from a deep dream, the prince shouted: "No need to go crazy, I have a better solution". He got out of his car a ladder he bought in the tool shop on climbed all the way to her. 
 So we might not always be doing this by the book, but I know you'\ll always keep looking for the right way to get to the heart of your princess :) 
 Love my modern knight in shiny armor ‚öîÔ∏è

Update: 
 I had a few errands in town today and I also went to the municipality to fill a form for getting an "I love my man diploma". They'\ve asked me why I love you. I told them that you'e wonderful and that ever since you came into my life they are soooo much better. The official smiled and issued it on for me on the spot. 

 It'\s valid forever :)

Imagine the following situation baby: 

 The two of us are sitting comfortably on the deck of a ship on its way to the Caribbeans. The wind blows our air, fish are jumping all around.. 
 A smiling waiter comes to serve some Pin‚Äéa Colada and suddenly he falls on the floor and spills the beverage on our feet. Is it good or bad? Depends on how you look at it :) 
 The point is that our relationship has a lot of beauty and power to it, and even if it'\s not perfect it doesn'	 have to be. It'\s good the way it is and that'\s the way I like it. 

 Love you ‚ù§

Prince, 

 I hired a harpist to come and play for us, but she turned out to be a harpy and didn'	 want to play nicely. For me it doesn'	 matter. With or without music, I want you to know that I love you the way you are ‚ù§ 

 Your event producer ;)

All rights over this relationship are reserved to us ¬©. You may not copy, distribute, intervene, gossip, fight, take a selfie, leave hair in the shower, adopt a cat, or buy an apartment without prior written permission of the publishers. Notwithstanding the above, you may love without limitation and write your partner how much you love being with him. \n\n For further information, please leave your details and our representative will contact you shortly ‚ù§

Sunshine, \n\n Our political journalist reports that the new amendment to the constitution: \'\Love\'\ had become an operative part of the constitution. All couples are required to express their affection towards one another or their relationship will be forwarded to the lovers-exceptions committee for a hearing. That was the opening headline of all national newspapers, luckily I don\'\t need this to tell you that you\'\re my gorgeous and will always be üíú

Sweetie, 

 When I traveled forward in time to the year 3010, people didn'	 need to touch each other because they could enter a relationship through Augmented reality and choose with a disturbing amount of accuracy the looks and character of their virtual partner. 
 And I thought to myself: I'\m so lucky to be here with you and love you the way you are, with no need of fancy glasses üå∏ 

 Yours, today and in 3010

Dearest, 

 I send you lots of Artichoke hearts so you know how much I love you. And if there'\s anything that pisses you off, just flush out the water and don'	 worry, I'\m always here for you and wishing only good for us both. 

 Your loving woman

I scream you scream we'\ll scream for a great relationship üç¶ 
 You'e my little ice-cream and no way I share you with anybody. You'e mine and mine only ;) 

 Your candy seller

I make a 10% annual return on my relationship!
 That'\s what I said to our investment Advisor during our meeting. He stared at me with the look of '\Where is the closest mental institution to your residence?'\ 
 I saw the apprehension in his eyes and told him with a smile '\You didn'	 get me right. Every year I become a 10% better person thanks to my partner.'\ We didn'	 come out with a million-dollar investment out of this meeting, but on every occasion such as the one described above (imaginary or not), I get a better sense of how much you mean for me and how much light you bring into my life. 

 Your investor üìà

To the most special guy, 

 It'\s never too late to appreciate the great man I have. I got during this life the gift of being with you and our relationship makes me stronger and gives me a warm place to come back to after a long day.
 This isn'	 a physical place, it'\s not full of things I'\ve bought and doesn'	 have a real estate value. Instead, it has one gorgeous man to give and receive love, and that'\s what really makes a difference. 

 Love,
 Me

Babe, 

 Just wanted to say that I had a good time being with you today. I'\m happy that it'\s good for us being together and would like it to continue this way :) 

 Your lady

Handsome, 

 Just wanted to say that I have this desire that you'\d love what you wore today. When you complement me you make me more beautiful and radiating, it'\s something that I'\ll never stop wishing for. And when that desire is fulfilled it is turned back to you too ;) 

 Me

Babe, 

 You'e beautiful, I love you, and no other words are needed. 

 Your girl ‚≠ê
Handsome, \n\n What can I do for you that will make your day better? That will make you happier?

Sugar, 

 If you'\d felt how many times you'\ve made me smile you would be so happy. If all the good things we went through together were assembled into one feeling in your heart, you would have felt such a deep grace, flooded with our love. 
 It'\s a great blessing that we found each other.


 Your loving woman
